title: Sara Institute
text:
R is programming language. R project website defines it as ‚Äúa language and environment for statistical computing and graphics‚Äù. R is very famous for its accurate statistical analysis and elegant graphics. It is equally powerful for developing Shiny apps.
We will be following the online book R for Data Science. Each chapter will be covered including the exercises.





Using this book will be covering these and more:

Data science framework
Data Visualization
Data Cleaning
Quarto for Slides, Websites, & Reports






Learning statistics is one of the most important part of the data science. We will be ‚Äúdiscovering‚Äù statistics using the book from one of the most respected and favourite author around the world - PROF. ANDY FIELD & HIS CAT PROF. MILTON üò∫





Using this book we will be the following topics:
Why you need science; Reporting research, variables and measurement; Summarizing Data; Fitting models (central tendency); Presenting data; z-scores; Probability; Inferential statistics; Robust estimation; Hypothesis testing; Modern approaches to theory testing; Assumptions; Relationships (correlation); The general linear model; comparing two means; Comparing several means; Factorial designs





Codes executes what you think but what you think it depends upon how you look upon an issue. Research methodology helps us to think critical about the problems and questions; it teachers us how to systematically find the earlier or other possible solution in the ocean of information. It also trains us how to use scientific methods to do analysis and reporting of the results without biases and following the ethics.
Academics or industry this course will be extremely helpful for you to evolve critical research thinking. We will be following three different books:

Contact
Sara Institute is based in Delhi NCR on the border of Delhi, Haryana, and Rajasthan. It is around 80 km (50 miles) from the Delhi Airport Terminal 3.

title: Sara Institute
text:
About us
Sara institute is a nonprofit data science organisation in Delhi NCR, India. Our dream is to empower marginalized communities using data science.
Every year, we admit thirty students from underrepresented communities and give them free residential data science education, projects, and job training. We believe for a better world data science needs to have a diverse perspective.


Our Values
People first
Open source


Meet our Team



Ajay Koli
Founder and Executive Director
